servinfo.title: Fuel Pump Description
servinfo.ptxt: The fuel pump (1) is an in-tank type electric pump. Incorporated in the pump assembly are;
a fuel filter (2) included and a fuel level gauge (3) attached.

Also, the jet pump (4) installed in the fuel pump sucks up the fuel from the sub fuel level sensor side to main fuel level sensor side through the fuel suction pipe / hose by using the negative pressure produced when the part of pressurised fuel with the fuel pump passes the venturi (5).
